title: Lemony monkfish kebabs
description: Spiced monkfish adds a meaty texture to pescatarian kebabs.You will need kebab skewers to make this recipe on the barbecue. Serve with jumbo couscous salad  for a perfect pairing.
ingredients: 400g/14oz vegetable selection (such as red onion, courgettes, aubergines and peppers) chopped into chunks.
